lead_paragraph: For the second time in three days a Briton was the meat in the Wimbledon sandwich for Roger Federer, as Dan Evans followed Marcus Willis in being swallowed up by the greatest grasscourt player in history.

headline.print_headline: Briton Evans Draws Inspiration From Brush With Greatness
headline.main: Briton Evans Draws Inspiration From Brush With Greatness

snippet: For the second time in three days a Briton was the meat in the Wimbledon sandwich for Roger Federer, as Dan Evans followed Marcus Willis in being swallowed up by the greatest grasscourt player in history....
